column5: also, this.  Would you help your uncle jack off the horse.  or would you help your Uncle Jack, off the horse
oh the irony......... (thread title)  You got that, didya??

English is a complex and often nonsensical language that is always changing. Writing it is equally difficult. I do notice when someone gets things a little sideways but try not to make an issue out of it, in part because I know there are some wholes holes in my skills.
P.S. the horse is named Mr. Hands.
In the words of the legendary George Carlin  "It's OK to prick your finger, but.... "
